name: Adrian Chan
bio: An experienced educator with over five years of international debate experience. Adrian is an ICYD International Finalist (2023), broke Oxford Schools (2025), and was the 3rd Best Speaker at the Team Canada Fundraiser (2025). He has condensed his debate knowledge into a debate accelerator used by over 100 debaters in Hong Kong, the UK, and the US.

name: Gavin Zhao
bio: A nationally ranked Public Forum debater with a strong track record on the China PF circuit and five years of experience. Gavin reached Tournament of Champions(TOC) in both 2022 and 2023, and competed at Oxford Schools 2025. In his role as Executive Director, Gavin co-leads the team’s operations, spearheads the web development, and Chinese Outreach.

name: Matthew Wong
bio: A competitive debater with four years of BP debating and adjudication experience. Matthew has competed at ICYD and Cambridge Schools, and currently serves as a Debate Society captain at Winchester. He brings over two years of coaching experience and extensive politics, economics, and international relations experience.

name: Arthur Zhang
bio: A top-performing PF debater: 2nd Place Team and Top Speaker at the 2023 Harvard International PF Tournament (Open Division), with past top finishes in 2022 and 2021. NSDA Global Excellent Debater (2020) and 1st Place at Wincheste College’s Inter-boarding house Debating Competition(Yaw Pot). Arthur brings his wealth of experience to lead our upcoming Public Forum course.

name: Jayden Su
bio: A leading member of several student-led organizations and charities, Jayden brings extensive administrative and operational experience. He was previously on the VSA and WIS Chinese debate teams.

name: Andre Chan
bio: A seasoned debater with experience in both WSDC and BP formats. Andre contributes to curriculum design and training with his 4+ years of experience.

name: Valmik Dangayach
bio: The youngest member of the Team Hong Kong Development Squad, with experience in both BP and WSDC formats. He recently won the U17 finals of Oxford WSDC 2025 and was the 13th-best speaker in the Hong Kong Debate Open.

name: Raul Laszlo-Louro
bio: An accomplished BP debater with experience at ICYD and Imperial Schools. Raul has been a finalist in multiple intra-school tournaments and mentors younger debaters.

name: Cici Chen
bio: A member of the Team China WSDC Development Team and Advanced Debate Team at Phillips Exeter Academy, she has had numerous successes across Asian circuits and brings a wealth of debate knowledge.

name: Dowan Kim
bio: Dowan has WSDC experience having competed in local WSDC competitions in Korea

name: Eric Jin
bio: A BP debater who recently placed 3rd at the Team Canada Fundraiser 2025 and at the Carroll College(University) Fundraiser 2025.

name: Aaryav Khaderia
bio: A decorated debater as the 4th best speaker in the Hong Kong Junior Schools Debating Championship 2024, and a member of the HK WSDC development team.

name: Hirannya Kumaresan
bio: Grand finalist of Qatar Prep Schools Debate League and octofinalist in international competitions

name: Tanvi Myneni
bio: Semifinalist for Hart House Debate Tournament 2025 and UBC Summer HST 2025 where she was the 9th place speaker. Finalist in YPC HST 2025 and Debateability Summer Championships 2025

name: Theodore Wang
bio: Trainer at Chongqing WSDC workshop 2024, Judged at Nanjing WSDC 2025,3rd best speaker at the 2025 Vietnam Asian Schools Debating Championships, and consistently broken at several other tournaments.

name: Rylan Wang
school: Arizona College Preparatory High School, US
bio: Taiwan National Speech & Debate Association (TNSDA) 2025 Champion and 4th Place, TNSDA – Congressional Debate

name: Srisha Boinapalli
bio: 4 years of PF experience and 6 months of LD experience, Varsity National Circuit debater for both PF and LD, Qualified for Middle School NSDA nationals for PF.

name: Jade Yoo
bio: A member of the Advanced Debate Team at Phillips Exeter Academy, she has had numerous successes within the DANEIS circuit.

name: Luke Chon
bio: Luke is a debater at Phillips Exeter Academy. He competed at the Harvard Model United Nations 75th Session.

name: Winston Chan
bio: Winston has debate and moot experience from both DBS and Winchester College. He specializes in helping new ESL debaters.

name: Aloysius Yeung
bio: Aloysius supports both coaching and program logistics.

name: Andrew Chen
bio: Supports the creation debate content as well as interacting with parents. He has PF debate experience.

name: Ana Trujillo
bio: A student leader with a year of Public Forum (PF) debate experience, she’s passionate about helping others learn and contributes to every team with focus, energy, and a steady drive to grow.

name: Emmanuel Zhang
bio: Emmanuel is a debater at Phillips Exeter Academy. He embodies the DebateCraft mission to democratize debating for all students.

name: Theo Okolo
bio: With a background in entrepreneurship and marketing, Theo drives the team’s outreach strategy and engagement efforts.

name: Mehar Singh
bio: With three years of oral interpretation and language, she supports our outreach efforts.

name: Vivien Shang
bio: Creates engaging content across social media platforms to achieve our mission of democratizing access to debate through free content. Vivien spent the summer TAing students and has experience in both teaching and encouraging students.

name: Andy Liu
bio: Works on digital outreach and visual media, helping reach new students. He brings experience from the Exonian Web Board.

name: Sophia Chen
bio: Through music-based outreach activities with elderly individuals and creating supply packages for community members for MLK Day, Sophia has develop strong communication skills by interacting with individuals seeking support and connection.

name: Mukiibi Calvin
bio: With five years of BP and WSDF experience, he brings his debate enthusiasm with social media flair.

name: Kevin Chen
bio: Works on digital outreach and debate content creation, helping expand our online presence. He brings experience from his web design role on the Exonian Web Board.

name: Aaditiya Bilakanti
bio: Plays a critical role in updating our website and is working on exciting AI debate tools. He has PF debate experience

name: Matthew Hao
bio: Matthew is a proficient PF debater regularly breaking quarterfinals and above in the NSDA China circuit.

name: Piers Ko
bio: Member of Team HK WSDC Development team and author of a daily current affairs newsletter
